metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7717 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48T and 6.0 before 2015-10-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 19573085, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-6596.

notes.Note: jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
